News.Title: Reliance Industrial Infrastructure Opens Special Window
News.Summary: Reliance Industrial Infrastructure Limited announces special window for transfer and dematerialisation of physical shares until February 04, 2027, benefiting investors who purchased shares before April 01, 2019.

News.Title: RIIL Reports Q3FY26 Results with 9.9% Profit Growth
News.Summary: Reliance Industrial Infrastructure Limited reported Q3FY26 consolidated net profit of ₹3.01 crores, up 9.9% YoY. Nine-month consolidated net profit reached ₹9.17 crores with EPS of ₹6.07.

News.Title: Reliance Industrial Infrastructure Reports Stable Q2 Performance with Net Profit of ₹306 Lakh
News.Summary: Reliance Industrial Infrastructure Limited reported quarterly results for the period ended September 30, 2025. On a consolidated basis, the company recorded total income of ₹1,813 lakh compared to ₹1,837 lakh in the same quarter last year, representing a marginal 1.3% decline primarily due to reduced other income. Net profit remained stable at ₹306 lakh versus ₹312 lakh in the corresponding quarter of the previous year. For the half-year period, consolidated net profit increased 2.3% to ₹616 lakh from ₹602 lakh. On a standalone basis, net profit for the quarter was ₹258 lakh compared to ₹243 lakh in the same period last year, showing a 6.2% improvement. The company continues to provide infrastructure support services including transportation of petroleum products and raw water through pipelines, primarily to Reliance Industries Limited. The company stated it does not have any expansion plans currently.

News.Title: Reliance Industrial Infrastructure Reports Q1 Financial Results
News.Summary: Reliance Industrial Infrastructure has announced its Q1 consolidated financial results. The company reported a net profit of 31 million rupees, compared to 29 million rupees in the same period last year. Revenue for Q1 stood at 125 million rupees, up from 124 million rupees year-over-year.

News.Title: Reliance Industrial Infrastructure Reports Q4 Financial Results
News.Summary: Reliance Industrial Infrastructure has announced its Q4 financial results. The company's consolidated net profit decreased to 32 million rupees from 37 million rupees year-over-year, but increased from 27 million rupees quarter-over-quarter. Q4 revenue fell to 125 million rupees from 145 million rupees year-over-year. The company has recommended a dividend of 3.50 rupees per equity share.

News.Title: Reliance Industrial Infrastructure Ltd: Board Recommends Rs 3.5 Dividend
News.Summary: Reliance Industrial Infrastructure Ltd's board has recommended a dividend of Rs 3.50 per equity share for FY 2025. The company approved audited financial statements and will announce AGM dates and dividend payment details soon. Q3 net profit declined by 25% to Rs 3.96 crore.

News.Title: Reliance Industrial Infrastructure Reports Q4 FY2023 Financial Results
News.Summary: Reliance Industrial Infrastructure Limited has announced its Q4 FY2023 financial results. The company reported a consolidated net profit of 32 million rupees, down from 37 million rupees year-over-year. Revenue for the quarter stood at 125 million rupees, a decrease from 145 million rupees in the same quarter last year. Sequentially, net profit increased from 27 million rupees in the previous quarter.

News.Title: Reliance Industrial Infrastructure to Consider Q4 Results on April 16
News.Summary: Reliance Industrial Infrastructure Limited has announced that it will consider its fourth quarter financial results on April 16. This is a standard quarterly financial reporting event for the company.

News.Title: Reliance Industrial Infrastructure Reports Decline in Q3 Financial Results
News.Summary: Reliance Industrial Infrastructure has reported a decrease in both net profit and revenue for the third quarter compared to the same period last year. The consolidated net profit fell to 27 million rupees from 36 million rupees, while revenue decreased to 124 million rupees from 149 million rupees year-over-year.

News.Title: Reliance Industrial Infrastructure Reports Decline in Q3 Profit and Revenue
News.Summary: Reliance Industrial Infrastructure has reported a decrease in both net profit and revenue for the third quarter. The company's consolidated net profit fell to 27 million rupees from 36 million rupees in the same period last year. Similarly, revenue declined to 124 million rupees from 149 million rupees year-over-year.

News.Title: Reliance Industrial Infrastructure to Consider Q3 Results on January 15
News.Summary: Reliance Industrial Infrastructure Limited has announced that it will consider and approve its financial results for the third quarter of the current fiscal year on January 15.

News.Title: PAPI System Testing Completed at Navi Mumbai International Airport
News.Summary: Reliance Industrial Infrastructure has announced that the Precision Approach Path Indicator (PAPI) system testing has been successfully completed at the Navi Mumbai International Airport. This marks an important milestone in the airport's development and readiness for operations.

News.Title: Reliance Industrial Infrastructure Reports Q2 Revenue Decline
News.Summary: Reliance Industrial Infrastructure's Q2 revenue decreased to 122.4 million rupees, down from 143.6 million rupees year-over-year and 124 million rupees quarter-over-quarter.

News.Title: Reliance Industrial Infrastructure Reports Q2 FY24 Results
News.Summary: Reliance Industrial Infrastructure Limited (RIIL) has reported its consolidated net profit for the second quarter of the fiscal year 2024. The company's net profit stands at 31.2 million rupees, showing a slight decrease from 31.8 million rupees in the same quarter last year (YoY). However, it represents an increase from 29 million rupees in the previous quarter (QoQ).

News.Title: Reliance Industrial Infrastructure Schedules Q2 Results Meeting
News.Summary: Reliance Industrial Infrastructure has announced a board meeting on October 11 to consider and approve the financial results for the second quarter of the current fiscal year.
